reviewText: PCI Leadership Principal Concept and Idea Leadership DVD by Dale Calvert is another great training from Dale Calvert that will help in your recruiting for any company.  I have been a follower of Dale's for several years and I find him to be one of the most honest and sincere trainers you will find.  He definitely over delivers in content.  I highly recommend this DVD.

Dale is a leader emeritus in the network marketing (MLM) business and has build successful leadership teams in not one, not two but three MLM companies.  He is an expert in building leaders within his team who can go out and successfully build their own team.  In this CD he teaches you how to do that, and that is the key to success in this industry. Do yourself a favor and buy it and cut years off your learning curve in building successful leadership in whatever business you are involved in.  Much of it translates nicely to any business.
